parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number to retrieve.If you provide invalid value the default page number will applied

Example: 1

Default Value: 1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of records per page.

Example: 20

Default Value: 20

Max Value: 100

If provided value is greater than max value, max value will be applied.

parameters.name: filter.type
parameters.description:
Filter by type query param.

Format: filter.type={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.type=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.type=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq
  • $in

parameters.name: filter.executor.(uuid)
parameters.description:
Filter by executor.(uuid) query param.

Format: filter.executor.(uuid)={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.executor.(uuid)=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.executor.(uuid)=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq
  • $in

parameters.name: filter.student.(uuid)
parameters.description:
Filter by student.(uuid) query param.

Format: filter.student.(uuid)={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.student.(uuid)=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.student.(uuid)=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq
  • $in

parameters.name: filter.achievement.(uuid)
parameters.description:
Filter by achievement.(uuid) query param.

Format: filter.achievement.(uuid)={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.achievement.(uuid)=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.achievement.(uuid)=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq
  • $in

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Parameter to sort by.

To sort by multiple fields, just provide query param multiple types. The order in url defines an order of sorting

Format: fieldName:DIRECTION

Example: sortBy=id:DESC&sortBy=createdAt:ASC

Default Value: createdAt:DESC

Available Fields

  • createdAt

get.summary: Get achievements for the authenticated user

Get achievements for the authenticated user
Can access: sputnik, curator

parameters.description:

Example: 1

Default Value: 1

parameters.name: limit

Example: 20

Default Value: 20

Max Value: 100

If provided value is greater than max value, max value will be applied.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Parameter to sort by.

To sort by multiple fields, just provide query param multiple types. The order in url defines an order of sorting

Format: fieldName:DIRECTION

Example: sortBy=id:DESC&sortBy=createdAt:ASC

Default Value: No default sorting specified, the result order is not guaranteed

Available Fields

503.description: The Health Check is not successful
The Health Check is not successful
The Health Check is not successful
The Health Check is not successful

filter.title: Filters that applied to the query

isVisibleInTop.description: If false, it is not shown in students rating

showUnseenAchievements.description: If false, achievements that have not been viewed won't be displayed.

receiveTgAchievementNotifications.description: If true, users receive notifications via Telegram.

receiveVkAchievementNotifications.description: If true, users receive notifications via VK.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the settings was last updated.
